meaningMnemonic: The <radical>correct</radical> way to block the <radical>sun</radical> with <radical>dirt</radical> is with an <kanji>embankment</kanji>. Build a huge, sloping embankment correctly and the sun won't be able to bother you ever again!
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, building a correct <kanji>embankment</kanji> doesn't just take dirt, but <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tots too. You pile up the dirt and the tater tots so the embankment can be nice and high.
